Tools¶

Finance¶

class tools.finance.TickerInfo[source]¶

TickerInfo can be used to get real-time financial information about assets listed in any global exchange. The module is powered with Yahoo Finance, and the tickers that can be used with TickerInfo are solely the ones permitted on Yahoo Finance.

How to use TickerInfo? Instantiate TickerInfo as an object and call its functions for results. Consider the example code below:

>>> tickerInfo = TickerInfo()
>>> tickerInfo.get_current_price("GOOG")
1431.72
>>> tickerInfo,get_purchase_recommendation("GOOG")
1.3
get_available_data_tags(ticker)[source]¶

Returns a list of available data for an asset ticker, as found in Yahoo Finance.

Parameters:ticker – (String) Asset ticker for globally listed companies, as supported by Yahoo Finance
Returns:(list) tags available for an asset ticker; Returns None if the information is not available
get_beta(ticker)[source]¶
Provides the beta coefficient for a given asset ticker. If the asset is a bond, the function returns the
3-year beta coefficient
Parameters:ticker – (String) Asset ticker for globally listed companies, as supported by Yahoo Finance
Returns:(int) beta coefficient; Returns None if the information is not available
get_company_data(ticker)[source]¶
Returns a dictionary of data associated with the asset ticker, as found in Yahoo Finance. For a list of
available data tags call TickerInfo.get_available_data_tags(tag).
Parameters:ticker – (String) Asset ticker for globally listed companies, as supported by Yahoo Finance
Returns:(dict) data associated with asset ticker; Returns None if the information is not available
get_current_price(ticker)[source]¶

Returns the current price of the asset

Parameters:ticker – (String) Asset ticker for globally listed companies, as supported by Yahoo Finance
Returns:(int) current price; Returns None if the information is not available
get_data_from_tag(ticker, tag)[source]¶

Returns available data for an asset ticker and a provided tag, as found in Yahoo Finance.

Parameters:
  • ticker – (String) Asset ticker for globally listed companies, as supported by Yahoo Finance
  • tag – (String) Data tag that is to be retrieved from Yahoo Finance. For a list of available data tags call TickerInfo.get_available_data_tags(tag)
Returns:

(int or String) data associated with asset ticker and provided tag; Returns None if the information is not available
get_industry(ticker)[source]¶
Returns the industry of the company that is represented by the asset ticker. If the ticker is not of a stock
the function will return None
Parameters:ticker – (String) Asset ticker for globally listed companies, as supported by Yahoo Finance
Returns:(String) the industry of the company represented by the asset ticker; Returns None if the information is not available
get_purchase_recommendation(ticker)[source]¶
Provides analysts recommendation for purchasing a stock.
1 – Strong Buy 2 – Buy 3 – Hold 4 – Underperform 5 – Sell
Parameters:ticker – (String) Asset ticker for globally listed companies, as supported by Yahoo Finance
Returns:(int) the number representation of stock purchase recommendation; Returns None if the information is not available
get_sector(ticker)[source]¶
Returns the sector of the company that is represented by the asset ticker. If the ticker is not of a stock,
the function will return None
Parameters:ticker – (String) Asset ticker for globally listed companies, as supported by Yahoo Finance
Returns:(String) the sector of the company represented by the asset ticker; Returns None if the information is not available
get_ytd(ticker)[source]¶

Returns the year-to-date return of the requested asset

Parameters:ticker – (String) Asset ticker for globally listed companies, as supported by Yahoo Finance
Returns:(int) year-to-date return; Returns None if the information is not available
